segments.text: I'm planning on going to the market soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know what we need .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can check for you , if you'd like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: First , we need eggs , milk , and bread .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK ! Do we need any meat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about some chicken , ground beef , and some steak .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Get some snack foods , too , dude .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything else that we need ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but if you can think of anything else , just get it .
segments.speaker: S2
